remarks: Group multiple (exponentiation) operation at negative one.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgnncl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgnncl.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgneg.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
mulgm1 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( -u 1 .x. X ) = ( I ` X ) ) $.
